name: Delivery Duck
description:
After picking up a delivery job, the duck now needs a little help in dropping off packages at a variety of different places!

Controls:
  • Hold down the mouse button on the duck to hold onto the package.
  • When letting go of the mouse button, the package will be dropped.
  • Move the mouse above and below the duck to control its speed and direction.
Instructions:
  • There will be a red target on the bottom of the screen indicating the distance of the target house.
  • Drop the package as accurately as possible on the house to receive the most points.
  • Avoid traffic birds, the fog, flying too high, and hitting telephone poles - they hurt!
